ModMetaData.name: Multiplayer
ModMetaData.author: RimWorld Multiplayer Team
ModMetaData.description: Important: This mod should be loaded as early as possible to work properly! Requires Rimworld =v1.1.2654 or >=v.1.2.2753\n Multiplayer mod v0.5.1.8 and v0.5.2.0 for Rimworld. FAQ - https://hackmd.io/@Swept/rimworldmultiplayerwiki Discord - https://discord.gg/S4bxXpv
